PROJECTS

Stratzy

I built their entire Android app using Flutter, ExpressJS, MongoDB, and Firebase Authentication. The app is an automated investment application which has multiple investment strategies that users can make use of to grow their money. The company just got funded for $800,000 dollars from multiple investors. App Store Link: Stratzy

View

Reha

Reha is a mobile dating app based on astrological predictions and vedic theory. A Caarya project for a client based in USA for the Indian Market. The astrological calculations relied on a library implemented by me ( npm link ). The application's system design and architecture was also done by me and that involved setting up a PostgreSQL, Express, Firebase Authentication, Firebase Cloud Messaging, AWS S3, React Native Stack. The company is well funded now and doing really well.

View

Astrocharts

I built an entire Android app using React Native and NodeJS The app shows your birth chart and navamsa chart using astrological principles. The algorithm for the above chart generations was borrowed from Open Source libraries which used NASA data. It was a fun project which took me a day to build and also gave a decent return on time investment. I launched it on the Google Play Store for ₹10 a download and it made me ₹2000 in it's first year. Which proves there's a demand for highly accurate apps in astrology.

View

Parkpoolr

Was my first project as an intern doing React, ExpressJS, PostgreSQL, and Firebase Authentication. The application provides an interface to make renting your parking space when you're not using it available to others. The project comprised of an iOS User Facing Application, an Admin Panel and a CMS (called Host Panel). The iOS application was built using React Native, Featuring react-native-maps, Google Directions, Google Places APIs, etc. The project is in production (The app is for the USA Market, so it won't be visible in the Indian Version of the Apple App Store) App Store Link (For Americans) : ParkPoolr

View

ABOUT

I am a fullstack software developer based in Bangalore. My stack generally revolves around React / React Native, NodeJS and the occasional Golang or Python.

Most recent freelance project was at Thinkify where I built a command line interface (CLI) which generates a fully functioning REST API from an Open API spec file.

I have a personal project which I was very proud of as it was my first android app that I sold to the world. I used the open source library that I built and made my own app out of it. It's called Astrocharts and is available on the Google Play Store. My belief on astrology is still no, but I am not a developer who won't like to help people with a different view on the world. Everybody should benefit from technology, automation and programming.
